message.body: My friend Monica is teaching yoga for kids age 4-6 at studio 34 Mondays 3:45-4:30. It's $10. No one has been coming so far so Luci could get a private yoga with you and Paz! Or you could hang out in the lounge! If you ever plan to come let me know and may
Good 2 know! Will try it sometime-if monica has an email msg with details i can 4ward it 2 some listservs..
I think there's a thing on the studio website. I will send it your way! Thank you!!! Xxxx
